Name: Unlock The King 3
About the game: New sequel of the successful Unlock The King, now with 3D boards based on Rubik's Cubes . A originally designed puzzle game inspired by Chess. Move the pieces and create a path to Unlock the King. Brand new gameplay mechanics based on the Rubik's cube; Originally designed concept, including electronic board, lightning-fast piece movements, trigger buttons and movable parts; 50 originally design levels; Original soundtrack; Designed for Unlock The King fans and newcomers alike;
